title: Anyone need a player for clash this weekend i can play any position :)
body:
I really don't mind where your team needs me i just wan't to try out clash :) 
prefer gold ranked teams but i mean beggars can't be choosers

replies.body: We need a mid player, but your op.gg only shows adc, how would you rate your mid lane skill?
we are silver and gold team mixed add me on league hotguy69
